frontmatter.description: Trust in people and be clear. Many problems are entirely unintentional and can be resolved with clear communication.
frontmatter.title: Trust that perceived problems are unintentional

frontmatter.description: Use the tools available to communicate with the most important people.
frontmatter.title: Make the most of available communication tools

frontmatter.description: Generate new ideas by making connections others may not notice. Each individual's inputs are unique and shape outputs.
frontmatter.title: Synthesize inputs and create original output

frontmatter.description: Don't let physical distance be the barrier. Use technology to connect personally.
frontmatter.title: Use technology to connect personally

frontmatter.description: Recognize the options and the unknowns. Control what is possible.
frontmatter.title: Recognize the options and unknowns

frontmatter.description: Use skills to pave a way for others. Help others by supporting them.
frontmatter.title: Develop opportunities to enable others

frontmatter.description: Make time to handle these small tasks before they become distractions from the important matters.
frontmatter.title: Small tasks unattended become distractions

frontmatter.description: When the next big change is beyond control, a feeling of being unanchored can develop.
frontmatter.title: Unstuck in time

frontmatter.description: Use intrinsic motivation to generate energy. Extrinsic motivators are limiting.
frontmatter.title: Generate energy intrinsically

frontmatter.description: Revise requirements as new information becomes available. Don't assume the original path is the only way forward.
frontmatter.title: Move projects forward with fresh perspectives
